creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: long, full skirt; long sleeves; very deep V-neck; maroon synthetic brocade with rows of maroon and silver fish; cuffs and neckline trimmed in red, white and blue floral printed fabric; bodice and sleeves decorated with yellow and black cording; hem decorated with yellow, green and gold decorative trims; bodice, sleeves and hem lines with green plaid fabric
title: Dress
